page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: The two farms in the block are both to the north of the A39,and there is part of another farm to the south of the road.The farms are Burnstone,in Clovelly parish and Bucks Barton in Woolsery parish.Burnstone farm is owned by the Clovelly Estate Company and has a tenant farmer.This farm runs a large dairy herd of Friesian cows,Bucks Barton has a smaller herd of the same breed. Both farms grow grass for silage and hay as winter feed for the stock.Their summer crops are wheat,barley and oats. Unmanaged woodland covers part of the land around London Lodge,and opposite Hobby Lodge there is another wood.The whole of Hobby Drive is woodland.
